name: Soccer Rebel
description:
Be a rebel!

Why play soccer when you can just hog the ball?

Ignore team mates, dodge opponents, and dribble your way to the goal with simple one touch controls.

Unlock 30 players from gingerbread men to giraffes, and zombies to invisible men. Or you could just stick a unicorn head on and be done with that...

Prove your skill and score a goal in all 8 destinations.

Show your true colors and customize your player's look and clothing.

Become the ultimate Soccer Rebel!

Music by world-renowned DJ Maher Daniel
